item.title: Create your own future
item.description: SPOILER ALERT: This blogpost is based on the book Lessons In Chemistry and contains spoilers. Elizabeth Zott hated being in class, sitting at a desk listening to monotonous teachers talking about boring subjects. It wasn’t that she didn’t enjoy learning. She loved it. But all the learning there was based on memorisation, and Elizabeth liked creativity. Elizabeth also disliked her classmates who did not share her hobbies. And all this made her suffer.
